item.description:
Come join us on the second (usually the third) Wednesday of the month at 7:00 PM at Jacob Wirth for some good food and light hearted Stammtisch talk. There is always something to talk about being German in Boston.

Feel free to bring a sample of Christmas cookies.

See you on Wednesday!

Please do not forget to RSVP

Kaj
Your humble organizer
P.S.: Austrian and Swiss people are welcome as well as anybody who lived for a while in these countries.
P.P.S.: Jacob Wirth is a German Restaurant in the theater district of Boston, that serves food such as Bratwurst and Sauerkraut or Wiener Schnitzel. They also have Paulaner Hefeweizen and other German beer.
item.name: German Expatriates in Boston Meetup December Meetup
